#Importação das bibliotecas
```{r}
if (!require(tidyverse)) install.packages("tidyverse") 
if (!require(readxl)) install.packages("readxl") 
if (!require(xlsx)) install.packages("xlsx") 
if (!require(tidyr)) install.packages("tidyr") 

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(tidyr)

```
